sentence: Oy, this movie really was something!
I particularily liked the part where the rabbit got driven over.
Nothing like seeing wildlife die horribly, don't you think...? No...?
I mean, you've gotta admit, the movie was actually really fun. It had a lot of fun character like Nukky the Cracker and Daphne the Detective
Why are you driving so fast, do you really hurry to do something... [color=red]bloody[/color]?
No? Just my imagination? I see...
Sometimes I wonder if there is any reason behind you driving. Why do you move forward?
Hey driver! Put on some rock music for me! You like the the current track? Are you sure we can't change...?
Driving slow like a turtle? Are we really going to reach your house at this speed?
If think you are just to paranoid right now. Relax and let the car go.
Wooooo man! Don't brake so rapidly, I almost spilled my coffee!
[fade start=4 length=20]Hey driver, I am the batman![/fade]     ...nevermind...
Quaggas are animals of marvel They are so beautiful and majestatic!
...wait, what do you mean they are [color=red]extinct[/color]?! Impossible, I just saw one recently!
Apparently the God really wanted to make custom text functions, [color=red]but he failed miserably[/color].
Are you sure we are going in the right direction? It seems like we are just moving forward...
These rabbits really like fun to drive over, don't you think? Just one time, stop hesitating.
I will give you a quest, drive over one of the animals and you will get a prize.
The prize may be nothing more than my gratitude, but it also matters, right?
Do you find me annoying? But we have been friends for like... when did we get into the car again...?
If you think you are smart, what's '2 + 2'?
Can't answer? Duuh, obviously. It's too hard for you.
Why are you doing this to me. This is almost like torture.
They are just running in front of you... just run over one, please.
Are
Are
Are
Are
